moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: Free open-source client for streaming games from your gaming PC. Compatible with Windows, MacOS, Linux, Steam Link devices, Raspberry Pi 4, ChromeOS laptops, tablets, Android devices, iPhones, iPads, iPod touches, AppleTV, single-board computers, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, PlayStation Vita with Homebrew, Nintendo Switch with Homebrew, Wii U with Homebrew, and LG webOS TVs.

playnite_watcher.name: Playnite Watcher

download.title: Download Sunshine-AIO
download.description: Download the latest version of Sunshine-AIO from GitHub. Important: Windows Defender or your antivirus may flag the file as suspicious. This is a false positive. You can safely bypass this warning by clicking 'More info' and then 'Run anyway'. If the file remains blocked, you may need to either add an exclusion in your antivirus settings for this file or temporarily disable your antivirus during the download and installation process.

run.title: Run the application
run.description: Right-click on Sunshine-AIO.exe and select 'Run as administrator.' This is a standalone executable file containing everything needed for the installation—it is not an installer but rather an all-in-one tool.

install.title: Start the installation
install.description: When the application starts, type '1' and press Enter to begin the full installation process. This will automatically install and configure all the necessary components for your game streaming setup.

complete.title: Installation Complete!
complete.description: After following these steps, Sunshine-AIO will be fully installed and configured on your system. You can now start streaming your games with Moonlight!

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: Sunshine-AIO is an all-in-one solution for setting up your game streaming environment. It simplifies the installation and configuration process for multiple tools required for game streaming, making it accessible to everyone.
